message: I'm feeling generous, but I'm also aware of the inflation.  Let's get this done quickly!
I'm not going to let you get away with such a small share! It's time to make a fair offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile. Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting closer, but I'm not willing to give up that much. I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers.
